ugg shoes for sale Global Network reporter Wang Huan reported that the U.S. and Japan began the morning of December 3, held joint military exercises. This is the second US-ROK joint military exercises, held in the waters near China's second large-scale military exercises, but also the largest in the history of US-Japan joint military exercises, the total strength of 4.5 million people participated. The first day of exercise, place in China has sovereignty over the waters near the Diaoyu Islands.
